b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout,body#layout div.section{font-family:Arial,sans-serif}body#layout{position:relative;max-width:700px;padding:20px;margin:0 auto;background:#2c3e50;border:1px solid #213243!important}body#layout .visibility .editlink{background:#2ecc71 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iQoCOwqjB-w/Wy1bDznOM4I/AAAAAAAACGA/8BUOPStr0sk5oud9hWpHBQTrmkeJDoAvACK4BGAYYCw/s18-c/mode_edit_w600_24dp.png) no-repeat center!important;padding:0;margin:0;border-radius:2px}body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{background:#2ecc71 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yTAuT5aZ1EY/Wy1eEeo4SbI/AAAAAAAACGM/FxOTPwL-Ch0_lyZxLRzhv2EWHINOmCjWACK4BGAYYCw/s22/draggable.png) no-repeat 4px 50%!important}body#layout div.section{background:transparent;margin:0 0 16px 0;padding:0;border:0}body#layout #wrapper:before,body#layout #top-bar:before,body#layout .sidebar-sticky:before,body#layout .sidebar:before,body#layout .Blog:before,body#layout .bellow-header-widget:before,body#layout #footer-widget-container:before,body#layout #footer-wrapper:before,body#layout .post-container:before{padding:5px 10px;display:block;color:#fff;background:#2ecc71;position:relative;border:1px solid #213243!important;margin:0 0 15px}body#layout .layout-widget-description{font-size:12px!important}body#layout .section h4{padding:8px 10px;display:block;font-size:12px;color:#fff;background:#34495e;border:1px solid #455668;font-weight:400;margin:0;opacity:.8;line-height:8px}body#layout .widget-content{padding:12px}body#layout .add_widget a{margin-left:0;font-size:14px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.6)!important}body#layout div.layout-title{font-size:14px}body#layout .editlink{color:#FFFFFF!important;background:#2ecc71;border-radius:2px;padding:2px 4px}body#layout #footer{position:relative}body#layout #temabanua-footer:after{padding:5px 10px;display:block;color:#fff;background:#2ecc71;position:relative;border:0!important;margin:15px 0 0}body#layout #temabanua-footer:after{content:"Template Blogger by Temabanua"}
